entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
